circumstances: The pilot was completing a local demonstration flight to potential customers. While on a night approach to Findley Airport, he failed to realize his altitude was insufficient when the airplane struck tree tops and crashed in a wooded area located few miles short of runway. The aircraft was destroyed and all three occupants were injured.
probable_cause: Improper IFR operation on part of the pilot-in-command who misjudged altitude and misread instruments/altimeter settings.
